title: Mandeh Ab
text: Mandeh Ab (, also <a href="Romanize">Romanize</a>d as Māndeh Āb) is a village in <a href="Kushk%20Rural%20District%20%28Khuzestan%20Province%29">Kushk Rural District</a>, <a href="Abezhdan%20District">Abezhdan District</a>, <a href="Andika%20County">Andika County</a>, <a href="Khuzestan%20Province">Khuzestan Province</a>, <a href="Iran">Iran</a>. At the 2006 census, its population was 36, in 5 families.
